Package distributed.Socket

Class ClientHandlerSocket

java.lang.Object
distributed.Socket.ClientHandlerSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, Runnable, Remote
public class ClientHandlerSocket extends Object implements Runnable, ClientInterface
Class that represents the communication between the socket client and its server
